message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $18,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $15,000 for it.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value. How about we meet in the middle at $16,500?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose $15,500 for the product.
